content: instant love instant love is a super-fast to knit hat that only takes 1 skein of yarn madelinetosh asap super bulky needle 13 us 9 00 mm or what you need to get gauge 11 us 8 0 mm knit entirely in the round brim up and seamless gauge 9 0 stitches x 14 row = 4 inches yardage 70 90 yards this is suitable for the whole family sizes kid adult head circumference 18 -21 22 -25 page 1 k2tog knit two stitches together ktbl knit into the back of the stitch ssk slip slip knit together p2tog purl two stitches together k2togtbl knit 2 stitches together into the backs of the stitches cast on 40 50 stitches with the smaller needle join in the round be careful to not twist and place a start of round marker round 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl ktbl ktbl purl 1 repeat to the end work round 1 7 8 times total change to the larger needle round 2 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 5 repeat to the end work round 2 until the hat measures 7 8 inches decreasing section round 3 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl p2tog purl 1 p2tog repeat to the end 32 40 stitches round 4 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 3 repeat to the end round 5 ktbl purl 1 ktbl purl 1 k2togtbl p2tog repeat to the end 24 30 stitches round 6 ssk repeat to the end 12 15 stitches cut your yarn with a 6 inch tail with a sewing needle slip all remaining stitches and draw close finishing weave in ends block and enjoy optional make a 4 pompom t put on top taiga hilliard designs© taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2016 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2
